metadata.title: CVE-2022-35133 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in CherryTree v0.99.30 allowsattackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payloadinjected into the Name text field when creating a node.

criterions.comment: cherrytree package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
